document.full_text: ireland tried to draw a line under its financial crisis on thursday by saying its banks need a further 24 billion euros ($34.11 billion) to withstand further economic shocks.
document.title: ireland says banks need further 24 billion euros
lines_and_colors: ireland tried to draw a line under its financial crisis on thursday by saying its banks need a further 24 billion euros ($34.11 billion) to withstand further economic shocks.
